name: Stakeholder Feedback
title: Stakeholder Feedback
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/3777462335 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Table of Contents

    • Gordon / PS - High Level Feedback:

Gordon / PS - High Level Feedback:

  • Custom SSO Integrations use SAML (simplesamllib)

  • There are different use-cases:

    • Login to panelwebsite (e.g. Ipsos)

    • Login to EFS Admin interface (sometimes called UniSSO)

    • Login to Portals (also using the sync to mysightv2)

      • Just-in-time provisioning is in place here

  • Just-in-time provisioning is used by at least 2 solutions

  • When users are automatically created some fields are synced

  • Also users get update on specific or specified fields
